entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Whitecourt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:28 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whitecourt Airport 3:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -19.7°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
